oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forrest Park in Bloom with Monument
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Gen. Forrest Monument in Forrest Park, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image.

“This historic park honors the memory of General Nathan Bedford Forrest, Confederate hero of the Battle of Memphis. He lies buried beneath his equestrian statue. The park covers the area bounded by Manassas and Dunlap Streets and Madison and Union Avenues.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forrest Park; parks; downtown; Forrest, Nathan Bedford; statues; monuments; gardens;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: E. C. Kropp Co., Milwaukee, Wis.; Collection processed by Angela Price
